verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass in the days אַמְרָפֶ֣ל <S%H569><s%> of Amraphel מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king שִׁנְעָ֔ר <S%H8152><s%> of Shinar אַרְי֖וֹךְ <S%H746><s%> Arioch מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אֶלָּסָ֑ר <S%H495><s%> of Ellasar כְּדָרְלָעֹ֙מֶר֙ <S%H3540><s%> Chedorlaomer מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king עֵילָ֔ם <S%H5867><s%> of Elam וְתִדְעָ֖ל <S%H8413><s%> and Tidal מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of nations

עָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> [That these] made מִלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> war אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with בֶּ֙רַע֙ <S%H1298><s%> Bera מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king סְדֹ֔ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> and with בִּרְשַׁ֖ע <S%H1306><s%> and with Birsha מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king עֲמֹרָ֑ה <S%H6017><s%> of Gomorrah שִׁנְאָ֣ב ׀ <S%H8134><s%> Shinab מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אַדְמָ֗ה <S%H126><s%> of Admah וְשֶׁמְאֵ֙בֶר֙ <S%H8038><s%> and Shemeber מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king [צְבֹיִים כ] (צְבֹויִ֔ים <S%H6636><s%> Zeboiim ק) וּמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king בֶּ֖לַע <S%H1106><s%> of Bela הִיא־ <S%H1931><s%> which is צֹֽעַר׃ <S%H6820><s%> Zoar

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these חָֽבְר֔וּ <S%H2266><s%> All these were joined together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> in the vale הַשִּׂדִּ֑ים <S%H7708><s%> of Siddim ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> which יָ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַמֶּֽלַח׃ <S%H4417><s%> is the salt

שְׁתֵּ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years עָבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> had served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּדָרְלָעֹ֑מֶר <S%H3540><s%> Chedorlaomer וּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> three עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> year מָרָֽדוּ׃ <S%H4775><s%> they rebelled

וּבְאַרְבַּע֩ <S%H702><s%> four עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> year בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> came כְדָרְלָעֹ֗מֶר <S%H3540><s%> Chedorlaomer וְהַמְּלָכִים֙ <S%H4428><s%> and the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וַיַּכּ֤וּ <S%H5221><s%> that [were] with him and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רְפָאִים֙ <S%H7497><s%> the Rephaims בְּעַשְׁתְּרֹ֣ת קַרְנַ֔יִם <S%H6255><s%> in Ashteroth Karnaim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזּוּזִ֖ים <S%H2104><s%> and the Zuzims בְּהָ֑ם <S%H1990><s%> in Ham וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאֵימִ֔ים <S%H368><s%> and the Emims בְּשָׁוֵ֖ה <S%H7740><s%> Shaveh קִרְיָתָֽיִם׃ <S%H7156><s%> Kiriathaim

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֹרִ֖י <S%H2752><s%> And the Horites בְּהַרְרָ֣ם <S%H2022><s%> their Mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <S%H8165><s%> Seir עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> far אֵ֣יל פָּארָ֔ן <S%H364><s%> unto Elparan אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> which [is] by הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> the wilderness

וַ֠יָּשֻׁבוּ <S%H7725><s%> And they returned וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵ֤ין מִשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H5880><s%> Enmishpat הִ֣וא <S%H1931><s%> he קָדֵ֔שׁ <S%H6946><s%> which [is] Kadesh וַיַּכּ֕וּ <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׂדֵ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> all the country הָעֲמָלֵקִ֑י <S%H6003><s%> of the Amalekites וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> and also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> and also the Amorites הַיֹּשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בְּחַֽצְצֹ֥ן תָּמָֽר׃ <S%H2688><s%> in Hazezontamar

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> And there went out מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king סְדֹ֜ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king עֲמֹרָ֗ה <S%H6017><s%> of Gomorrah וּמֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king אַדְמָה֙ <S%H126><s%> of Admah וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king [צְבֹיִים כ] (צְבֹויִ֔ם <S%H6636><s%> Zeboiim ק) וּמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king בֶּ֖לַע <S%H1106><s%> of Bela הִוא־ <S%H1931><s%> (the same צֹ֑עַר <S%H6820><s%> Zoar וַיַּֽעַרְכ֤וּ <S%H6186><s%> arrayed אִתָּם֙ <S%H854><s%> against מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> battle בְּעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> with them in the vale הַשִּׂדִּֽים׃ <S%H7708><s%> of Siddim

אֵ֣ת <S%H854><s%> against כְּדָרְלָעֹ֜מֶר <S%H3540><s%> With Chedorlaomer מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king עֵילָ֗ם <S%H5867><s%> of Elam וְתִדְעָל֙ <S%H8413><s%> and with Tidal מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of nations וְאַמְרָפֶל֙ <S%H569><s%> and Amraphel מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king שִׁנְעָ֔ר <S%H8152><s%> of Shinar וְאַרְי֖וֹךְ <S%H746><s%> and Arioch מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אֶלָּסָ֑ר <S%H495><s%> of Ellasar אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four מְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> kings אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> against הַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> with five

וְעֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> And the vale הַשִׂדִּ֗ים <S%H7708><s%> of Siddim בֶּֽאֱרֹ֤ת <S%H875><s%> [was full of] בֶּאֱרֹת֙ <S%H875><s%> pits חֵמָ֔ר <S%H2564><s%> of tar וַיָּנֻ֛סוּ <S%H5127><s%> fled מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> and the kings סְדֹ֥ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֖ה <S%H6017><s%> and Gomorrah וַיִּפְּלוּ־ <S%H5307><s%> and fell שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> who וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <S%H7604><s%> there and they that remained הֶ֥רָה <S%H2022><s%> to the mountain נָּֽסוּ׃ <S%H5127><s%> fled

וַ֠יִּקְחוּ <S%H3947><s%> And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רְכֻ֨שׁ <S%H7399><s%> all the goods סְדֹ֧ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֛ה <S%H6017><s%> and Gomorrah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אָכְלָ֖ם <S%H400><s%> and all their victuals וַיֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> and departed

וַיִּקְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ל֧וֹט <S%H3876><s%> Lot וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רְכֻשׁ֛וֹ <S%H7399><s%> and his goods בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אֲחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> brother's אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> Abram's וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> and departed וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> who dwelt בִּסְדֹֽם׃ <S%H5467><s%> in Sodom

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> And there came הַפָּלִ֔יט <S%H6412><s%> one that had escaped וַיַּגֵּ֖ד <S%H5046><s%> and told לְאַבְרָ֣ם <S%H87><s%> Abram הָעִבְרִ֑י <S%H5680><s%> the Hebrew וְהוּא֩ <S%H1931><s%> now he שֹׁכֵ֨ן <S%H7931><s%> for he dwelt בְּאֵֽלֹנֵ֜י <S%H436><s%> in the plain מַמְרֵ֣א <S%H4471><s%> of Mamre הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <S%H567><s%> the Amorite אֲחִ֤י <S%H251><s%> brother אֶשְׁכֹּל֙ <S%H812><s%> of Eshcol וַאֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> and brother עָנֵ֔ר <S%H6063><s%> of Aner וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> and these בַּעֲלֵ֥י <S%H1167><s%> archer בְרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> confederacy אַבְרָֽם׃ <S%H87><s%> with Abram

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> And when Abram כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִשְׁבָּ֖ה <S%H7617><s%> was taken captive אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> that his brother וַיָּ֨רֶק <S%H7324><s%> he armed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲנִיכָ֜יו <S%H2593><s%> his trained יְלִידֵ֣י <S%H3211><s%> [servants] born בֵית֗וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his own house שְׁמֹנָ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen וּשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַיִּרְדֹּ֖ף <S%H7291><s%> and pursued עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far דָּֽן׃ <S%H1835><s%> [them] unto Dan

וַיֵּחָלֵ֨ק <S%H2505><s%> And he divided עֲלֵיהֶ֧ם ׀ <S%H5921><s%> against לַ֛יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> himself against them he and his servants וַיַּכֵּ֑ם <S%H5221><s%> and smote וַֽיִּרְדְּפֵם֙ <S%H7291><s%> them and pursued עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far חוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2327><s%> them unto Hobah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which מִשְּׂמֹ֖אל <S%H8040><s%> which [is] on the left hand לְדַמָּֽשֶׂק׃ <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus

וַיָּ֕שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> And he brought back אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרְכֻ֑שׁ <S%H7399><s%> all the goods וְגַם֩ <S%H1571><s%> and also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ל֨וֹט <S%H3876><s%> Lot אָחִ֤יו <S%H251><s%> his brother וּרְכֻשׁוֹ֙ <S%H7399><s%> and his goods הֵשִׁ֔יב <S%H7725><s%> and also brought again וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> and also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> and the women וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> also and the people

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> went out מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king סְדֹם֮ <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom לִקְרָאתוֹ֒ <S%H7125><s%> to meet אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> him after שׁוּב֗וֹ <S%H7725><s%> his return מֵֽהַכּוֹת֙ <S%H5221><s%> from the slaughter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּדָר־ לָעֹ֔מֶר <S%H3540><s%> of Chedorlaomer וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> and of the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at עֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> that [were] with him at the valley שָׁוֵ֔ה <S%H7740><s%> of Shaveh ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> which עֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> dale הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> [is] the king's

וּמַלְכִּי־ צֶ֙דֶק֙ <S%H4442><s%> And Melchizedek מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king שָׁלֵ֔ם <S%H8004><s%> of Salem הוֹצִ֖יא <S%H3318><s%> brought forth לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread וָיָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> and wine וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> now he כֹהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> and he [was] the priest לְאֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> of the most high

וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <S%H1288><s%> And he blessed וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> him and said בָּר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אַבְרָם֙ <S%H87><s%> [be] Abram לְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God עֶלְי֔וֹן <S%H5945><s%> of the most high קֹנֵ֖ה <S%H7069><s%> possessor שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> and earth

וּבָרוּךְ֙ <S%H1288><s%> And blessed אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God עֶלְי֔וֹן <S%H5945><s%> be the most high אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Who מִגֵּ֥ן <S%H4042><s%> which hath delivered צָרֶ֖יךָ <S%H6862><s%> thine enemies בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> into thy hand וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> And he gave ל֥וֹ מַעֲשֵׂ֖ר <S%H4643><s%> him tithes מִכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> of all

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king סְדֹ֖ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְרָ֑ם <S%H87><s%> unto Abram תֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לִ֣י הַנֶּ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> me the persons וְהָרְכֻ֖שׁ <S%H7399><s%> the goods קַֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> and take לָֽךְ׃

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> And Abram אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king סְדֹ֑ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom הֲרִימֹ֨תִי <S%H7311><s%> I have lift up יָדִ֤י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God עֶלְי֔וֹן <S%H5945><s%> the most high קֹנֵ֖ה <S%H7069><s%> the possessor שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> and earth

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> That I will not מִחוּט֙ <S%H2339><s%> [take] from a thread וְעַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> against שְׂרֽוֹךְ־ <S%H8288><s%> thong נַ֔עַל <S%H5275><s%> A sandal וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and that I will not אֶקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> take מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לָ֑ךְ וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תֹאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> any thing that [is] thine lest thou shouldest say אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I הֶעֱשַׁ֥רְתִּי <S%H6238><s%> rich אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָֽם׃ <S%H87><s%> Abram

בִּלְעָדַ֗י <S%H1107><s%> Save רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> but אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> only that which אָֽכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> have eaten הַנְּעָרִ֔ים <S%H5288><s%> the young men וְחֵ֙לֶק֙ <S%H2506><s%> and the portion הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> of the men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הָלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> which went אִתִּ֑י <S%H854><s%> with עָנֵר֙ <S%H6063><s%> me Aner אֶשְׁכֹּ֣ל <S%H812><s%> Eshcol וּמַמְרֵ֔א <S%H4471><s%> and Mamre הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> let them יִקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> take חֶלְקָֽם׃ <S%H2506><s%> their portion ס
